name: Tanker Oil Transport Sim
description:
Be a good driver & transport the oil from station to station on time

Features:
• Different camera angels to explore a 3D city enviornment
• Heavy oil tanker driving experience with variety of tankers
• Detailed HD graphics with amazing game play
• Unique gameplay of oil selling, buying & transporting to stations
• Exciting levels with gradually increasing difficulty
• Easy & Fun to play with smooth controls
